## ASTNode.getSourceBlock() method

Finds the source block of the location of this node.  The source block of the location, or null if the node is of type workspace.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSourceBlock(): Block | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Block](./blockly.block.md) \| null
